priorVersion.title: CDISC DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C188700

self.title: CDISC DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology

definition: A terminology value set relevant to the attributes of the study protocol version.
name: DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology
submissionValue: DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology
synonyms: DDF Study Protocol Version Attribute Terminology

terms.definition: The short descriptive name for the protocol.
The formal descriptive name for the protocol.
A condition of the protocol at a point in time with respect to its state of readiness for implementation.
The descriptive name of the protocol that is intended for the lay public, written in easily understood language.
terms.preferredTerm: Study Protocol Document Version Public Title

terms.definition: A more extensive descriptive name of the protocol that is intended for medical professionals, written using medical and scientific language.
The date and time specifying when the protocol amendment takes effect or becomes operative.
A written description of a change(s) to, or formal clarification of, a protocol. (ICH E6)

A plan at a particular point in time for a formal investigation to assess the utility, impact, pharmacological, physiological, and/or psychological effects of a particular treatment, procedure, drug, device, biologic, food product, cosmetic, care plan, or subject characteristic. (BRIDG)
